Posts.Content: I am I am awaiting a mastectomy but not yet had SNB. However, my mother had to have a mastectomy at around the same age as me (57) and refused chemo. This did not seem to have had an adverse affect on her as she lived another 15+ years before dying of alcoholism! I don't like the idea of chemotherapy myself and will be taking an alternative natural substance which has had great results where it is legally available in the USA.Â
Posts.Title: Lymph node treatment chemo or not

Posts.Content: So nice to hear positive stories. Thank you. All the very best to you. X
Posts.Title: Don't want hormone/endocrine drugs
